scripts.postinstall: if [ -f prisma/schema.prisma ] && grep -q "^model " prisma/schema.prisma; then npx prisma generate; else echo 'Skipping prisma generate (no models in prisma/schema.prisma)'; fi
scripts.vercel-build: if [ -f prisma/schema.prisma ] && [ -n "$DATABASE_URL" ] && [ -d prisma/migrations ]; then npx prisma migrate deploy; else echo 'Skipping prisma migrate (no migrations or DATABASE_URL)'; fi && next build
